universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Default: The app is dark mode only. Do not implement light mode toggles unless critical.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid white or grey for readability.
Data Density: Avoid excessive padding in data tables. Use 'compact' mode.
Real-time Feel: Use pulsing dots or 'Live' badges to indicate real-time data.
Testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
No Emoji Icons: Use Lucide React icons instead of emojis.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers and tooltips.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Dashboard with a Bento Grid layout. The World Map is the hero. Use 'react-simple-maps' for the map. Fetch data from the backend (mock if needed initially). Use Shadcn components for all UI elements but override styles to match the 'Electric & Neon' theme. Ensure all numbers use JetBrains Mono.
